scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q client\dist client\node_modules server\node_modules node_modules 2>nul || echo Clean complete
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
